name: Silence Ritual
description:
Hello, this is my entry to http://itch.io/jam/gdl-january-jam!

"Our protagonist was curious about the "Silence ritual" that he heard from his friends, known as a ritual where ghostly voices are heard in the darkness, the lights must be kept on to silence the voices, otherwise he will have to accompany the voices for the rest of eternity or at best, get insane. He jokingly decided to do this ritual, but far from being what he expected, it was real, and now his life was in danger."

#@GameDevLeague
